heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Competition Act 2002
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Competition Act 2002 

(Adjudication Officers) Regulations 2025.

text_raw:

In these Regulations, “principal regulations” means the Competition Act

title: 2022)) of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 14 of 2002), for the purposes of giving
heading: 3. Regulation 15 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (5),
text_raw:
3. Regulation 15 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (5), 

by the substitution of “Regulation 31” for “Regulation 0”.

title: 2022)) of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 14 of 2002), for the purposes of giving
heading: 4. Regulation 24 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (5),
text_raw:
4. Regulation 24 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (5), 

by the substitution of “appropriate authority” for “relevant authority”. 

Amendment of Regulation 29 of principal regulations
text_norm: 4 regulation 24 principal regulation amended paragraph (5) substitution appropriate authority relevant authority  amendment regulation 29 principal regulation

title: 2022)) of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 14 of 2002), for the purposes of giving
heading: 5. Regulation 29 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (1),
text_raw:
5. Regulation 29 of the principal regulations is amended, in paragraph (1), 
by the substitution of “Where an assessment is required under Regulation 7, 11, 
15 or 24,” for “Where an assessment is required under Regulation 7, 11 or 24,”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2025. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment . 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th September, 2025.

title: 2022)) of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 14 of 2002), for the purposes of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to address a typographical error identified 
in 15(5) of the Competition Act 2002 (Adjudication Officers) Regulations 2023 
and to provide further clarification and consistency on regulations 24(5) and 
29(1).
